index.doc:
# TestH library documentation.
This documentation aims to support the understanding of the existing code.
You can get the source code from [testH repository](https://github.com/cdgramos/testh) on github.

category.name: batt.h
category.brief: batt.h provides batteries to compare various target hurst parameter values with the ones estimated for a defined generator.

category.name: proc.h
category.brief: proc.h provides interfaces to manipulate processes.

category.name: gen.h
category.brief: gen.h provides generators of self-similar sequences.

category.name: est.h
category.brief: est.h provides estimators of the hurst parameter.

category.name: io.h
category.brief: io.h defines file handling and printing functions.

category.name: reg.h
category.brief: reg.h defines regression analysis functions and data types.

category.name: rng.h
category.brief: rng.h defines random number generator functions.

category.name: sim.h
category.brief: sim.h provides generators which can simulate a certain kind of data.

category.name: util.h
category.brief: defines general memory, time, sort and system functions.
